Novanta: Return On Capital Employed Insights
summary: Novanta (NASDAQ:NOVT) posted a 34.98% decrease in earnings from Q4. Sales, however, increased by 10.23% over the previous quarter to $162.58 million. Despite the increase in sales this quarter, the decrease in earnings may suggest Novanta is not utilizing their capital as effectively as possible.
